name: Diveshot
description:
Your enemy is down below. The quickest way to get there? DIVING. It's just you and your gun. Shoot, shoot, go sloooow. It's going to be a rocky way down. Can you make it to the enemy in one piece? In, DIVESHOT.

Also, you can change your character's color!

Controls:

Move left: A, Left Arrow, L-Thumbstick-Left

Move right: D, Right Arrow, L-Thumbstick-Right

Dive: S, Down Arrow, L-Thumbstick-Down

Shoot: LMB, RT

Slow time: Spacebar, LT

Made during GrizzHacks 5, 9/18/2020 - 9/20/2020

GitHub: https://github.com/juliawang2014/diveshot
